meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 10, 2023 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.description: Presentation on the emergency alert and warning systems currently in use.

agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and progress of the Violent Crime Reduction Plan.

agenda_items.description: Update on the quality management program for EMS services.

agenda_items.description: Discussion on the legislative priorities for public safety.
